dataIdInfo.idAbs: After creating a new GNAT Riverscapes project with the Create New GNAT Project tool, the user should then Load Input Datasets with this tool. The input stream network feature class and network topology tables will preferably have been generated by the tools in Step 1 - Stream Network Preparation. Each Riverscapes project is based on these datasets.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Kelly Whitehead, Jesse Langdon, South Fork Research, Inc.

tool.name: LoadNetworkToProject

param.name: projectXML
param.dialogReference: The Riverscape project XML file (named "project.rs.xml") which stores all of the relevant information for each GNAT project.

param.name: InputFCStreamNetwork
param.dialogReference: The stream network polyline feature class which represents the initial state of the stream network, produced by the tools in Step 1 - Stream Network Preparation.

param.name: tblNetwork
param.dialogReference: The network topology table (typically named "StreamNetworkTable.dbf") that is produced by the tools in Step 1 - Stream Network Preparation.

tool.summary: After creating a new GNAT Riverscapes project with the Create New GNAT Project tool, the user should then Load Input Datasets with this tool. The input stream network feature class and network topology tables will preferably have been generated by the tools in Step 1 - Stream Network Preparation. Each Riverscapes project is based on these datasets.
